text: @SpeakerPelosi Nancy I can sum up your coronavirus response in two words "Trumps Wrong". But truly your an absolute horrible person, you care for no one but yourself and your corrupt agenda. Going through life with nothing but hate and lies is no way to live, of course you know nothing else.
